scenarios.title: Item can be added to cart

steps.step: Given that the cart is empty
steps.cause:
Given that the cart is empty
cause : org.seleniumhq.selenium.fluent.FluentExecutionStopped: NoSuchElementException during invocation of: ?.within(secs(2)).div(By.id: cart)

steps.step: When I search for an item
And an item is added to the cart
Then the cart contains that item

scenarios.title: Item can be removed from cart

steps.step: Given the cart contains one item
Then the cart contents is empty
